Name: HMS Lookout
Builder: Scotts Shipbuilding and Engineering Company, (Greenock, Scotland)
awards:
Diego Suarez 1942
Malta Convoys 1942
Arctic 1942
North Africa 1942–43
Sicily 1943
Salerno 1943
South France 1944
Mediterranean 1943–45
Badge: On a Field per fess wavy White and Blue, a man in crow’s nest of Whaler, all proper.
Propulsion:
Two shafts
Two geared steam turbines
Two drum type boilers
48000 shp (35.8 MW)
Range: 5,500 nautical miles (10,200 km) at 15 kn (28 km/h)
Armament:
Original configuration:
3 × 2 – QF 4.7-inch Mk XI dual purpose guns
1 × 1 – QF 4-inch Mk V anti-aircraft gun
1 × 4 – QF 2-pounder Mk VIII anti-aircraft guns
2 × 4 – QF .5-inch Vickers Mk III anti-aircraft machine guns
2 × 4 – 21-inch (530 mm) torpedo tubes
